CustomField.description: Formula checkbox indicating if the task is overdue (Due Date is in the past and task is not Completed or Closed)
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c)), Due_Date__c < TODAY(), TEXT(Status__c) != "Completed", TEXT(Status__c) != "Closed" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically checked when Due Date is in the past and task status is not Completed or Closed. Used for filtering and reporting on overdue tasks.
CustomField.label: Is Overdue
